entries.meaning: (dated, India) A mounted procession; a cavalcade.
examples: The Rajah's sowarree was very grand and superb. He had twenty elephants with richly embroidered ambarrehs, the whole of them mounted by his Sirdars,â€”he himself riding on the largest, just in the centre.
